general.description: Creates a new emoji based on a given emoji or a link to an image

options.description: Enter an emoji or a link to an image
Enter what you want the new emoji to be called

errors.invalidEmojiOrLink: You must specify an emoji or a link to an image.
errors.invalidLinkExtension: If you provide a link, it must lead to an image.
errors.missingName: If you specify a link, you must also specify a name for the new emoji.
errors.errorWhileCreating: An unexpected error occurred while creating the emoji.
